MEANINGS.POS_TIP: adjective: describes a noun or pronoun
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Full of or exposed to a lot of sunshine; bright with sunshine.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 阳光充足的；充满阳光的；明媚的
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: It was a beautiful sunny afternoon, perfect for a walk in the park.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 那是一个阳光明媚的下午，非常适合在公园里散步。

MEANINGS.PATTERN: [sb] has a sunny disposition | [sth] is sunny (mood)
MEANINGS.POS_TIP: adjective: describes a noun or pronoun
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Having a cheerful, optimistic, or lively disposition or mood.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 开朗的；乐观的；快活的；愉快的
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Despite facing challenges, she always maintains a sunny outlook on life.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 尽管面临挑战，她总是对生活保持乐观积极的态度。
